title: The Pill is a LIE | American Horror Story Double Feature Theory!
author: Reel Talk
comment:
Correction: Dr. Lark was a tattoo artist on top of being a doctor.

Still, I'm very curious on how the pale creatures get their teeth if it isn't a fixture of the drug itself. Might be wrong, but I like this theory.

I think Micky is going to write a screenplay that Phoenix chooses over Harry's...thus creating a feud or tension between the both of them. There has to be a reason that they are BOTH writing screenplays.
I don’t care what anyone says, this is hands down one of the best and most cared for seasons in years!! I love the flow so far
I thought they were really good. Maybe this was why Stories was so mediocre 😂 Because they were spending all their focus on perfecting This.
I have a theory that the second part of this season is the screenwriting that Harry is working on. Cause it's too short and these two stories has to be connected.
description:
The Pill is a LIE | American Horror Story Double Feature Theory! Am I the only one who thinks that the pill in AHS Double Feature isn't all that it is cracked up to be? What's up with the creature's teeth if they aren't a natural side effect? What if this season isn't pointing out a lack of creativity, but the concept of wholistic creativity. Essentially, you might only have one story to tell...then what?
